meanings.definition: A person who makes a pledge or promise.
meanings.sent1: The pledgeor promised to always be there for his friend.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the pledgeor to raise their hand if they made the promise.
meanings.sent3: The pledgeor joked that they would pledge to eat a hundred cookies every day.
meanings.sent4: She was a true pledgeor, always keeping her word no matter what.
meanings.sent5: The little girl proudly declared herself as the pledgeor of sharing her toys with her siblings.

meanings.definition: To make a solemn promise or agreement.
meanings.sent1: He will pledgeor to always support his team through thick and thin.
meanings.sent2: The couple decided to pledgeor their love for each other in front of their families.
meanings.sent3: The friends playfully pledgeor to never eat pizza again, but they knew it was impossible.
meanings.sent4: The leader pledgeored to lead his people to a brighter future, no matter the challenges.
meanings.sent5: She pledgeored to always be honest with herself and others, no matter how difficult it may be.
